title: Government Effectiveness Index vs. Electoral Democracy Index
subtitle: The government effectiveness index captures perceptions of the quality of public services, the civil service, and policy formulation and implementation (positive values mean higher effectiveness). The electoral democracy index is by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), based on expert estimates, and ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
